document_data.name: Kurr
document_data.mainbody: '''Kurr''' was a [[gnoll]] [[Gnoll#Religion|fang of Yeenoghu]] in the [[Labyrinth]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Kurr suffered from a peculiar form of [[demon lord]]â€“spread madness: he felt guilty for all the people he had killed. He hoped to find someone who could kill him and his pack.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Kurr led his pack of [[hyena]]s into the Labyrinth searching for [[Yeenoghu]]. He had them feast on the corpses of his slain victims, transforming them into gnolls. They wandered the area and Kurr succumbed to madness.
